Mooi is a dutch word for beautiful. MOOOI added an extra "O" to emphasize the uniqueness and beauty of their products. The company was founded by Marcel Wanders & Casper Vissers in 2001. MOOOI developed their own fresh approach to product & style, which is daring, playful and exquisite.
